description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: An unauthorized node injection vulnerability has been identified in ROS2 Galactic Geochelone versions where ROS_VERSION is 2 and ROS_PYTHON_VERSION is 3, allows remote attackers to escalate privileges.

Se ha identificado una vulnerabilidad de inyección de nodo no autorizada en las versiones ROS2 Galactic Geochelone donde ROS_VERSION es 2 y ROS_PYTHON_VERSION es 3, lo que permite a atacantes remotos escalar privilegios.
